content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at position(x=unknown)
Consists of a lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### Chests at various positions
Consists of multiple chests at positions (x=43.5, y=-82.5), (x=40.5, y=-80.5), (x=43.5, y=-81.5), (x=2.5, y=0.5), (x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the pipe connection points are not obstructed by other entities before attempting to connect pipes.
- Make sure that the fluid system is properly set up before attempting to connect pipes.
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has sufficient fuel before attempting to mine.
- Make sure that the burner mining drill is properly placed and configured before attempting to mine.
### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has sufficient fuel and ingredients before attempting to smelt.
- Make sure that the furnace is properly placed and configured before attempting to smelt.
### Errors when using chests
- Ensure that the chest is not full before attempting to insert items.
- Make sure that the chest is properly placed and configured before attempting to insert items.
